titles.title: Recognizing the significant human rights activism and baseball stardom legacy of Roberto Clemente.
Recognizing the significant human rights activism and baseball stardom legacy of Roberto Clemente.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Accountability.

bill.summary: This resolution recognizes the accomplishments of Roberto Clemente, the first Puerto Rican to be elected to the National Baseball Hall of Fame, and urges Major League Baseball to permanently retire the number 21 in honor of his life and legacy and to expand Roberto Clemente Day.
